segments.text: Then , I ’ ll see you next week , Ms . O ’ Brian ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Let ’ s say Tuesday at noon . Bring your portfolio with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . Is there anything else you would like me to bring , Mr . O ’ Brian ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , that ’ s all . I already have your resume .
segments.speaker: S2
